name: Techgecko
description:
Friendly IT help and consultancy for business, education and home. We strive to be different. Honest, reliable, and jargon-free. We take the time to understand our customers, how they work, what they need, and to find the best solutions for them. Every customer is different and that’s why we don’t try to fit a square peg into a round hole.
Techgecko was founded by Ant Kittle, an IT professional with more than 16 years’ experience working with education, finance and government organisations.
